description: Detects URL patterns that could be found in ProxyShell exploitation attempts against Exchange servers (failed and successful) Author: Florian Roth, Rich Warren. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Exchange ProxyShell Pattern
query: ((url.original:*\/autodiscover.json* AND url.original:(*\/powershell* OR *\/mapi\/nspi* OR *\/EWS* OR *X\-Rps\-CAT*)) OR url.original:(*autodiscover.json?@* OR *autodiscover.json%3f@* OR *%3f@foo.com* OR *Email\=autodiscover\/autodiscover.json* OR *json?@foo.com*))
